episodes.title: Goku's Rival
episodes.plot: The start of the "Tournament Saga". Goku begins his training with Master Roshi. Also, Roshi takes a young boy named Krillin as his student. Meanwhile, Yamcha, Bulma, Puar, and Oolong are on their way to the city, but they crash their vehicle in the jungle, and later get lost in the desert.

episodes.title: Look Out for Launch
episodes.plot: Goku and Krillin find a girl for Master Roshi: a sweet girl named Launch... who holds an alternate personality as the deadliest bandit ever!

episodes.title: Find That Stone!
episodes.plot: Roshi takes Goku, Krillin, and Launch to a large island for their training, which includes lots of running and finding a stone which Roshi throws into the jungle.

episodes.title: Milk Delivery
episodes.plot: Roshi incorporates running across the entire island to deliver milk as part of Goku and Krillin's morning training, thus helping to prepare them for the World Martial Arts Tournament. Meanwhile, Yamcha is training for the tournament as well.

episodes.title: The Turtle Hermit Way
episodes.plot: Goku's and Krillin's training continues. They must till land with their bare hands, study, do construction work, move large rocks, swim, and dodge angry bees.

episodes.title: The Tournament Begins
episodes.plot: As the World Martial Arts Tournament approaches, Goku's and Krillin's training becomes more intense. Meanwhile, Yamcha increases his own training, causing Bulma to feel neglected.

episodes.title: Elimination Round
episodes.plot: The first round of the World Martial Arts Tournament begins, and Goku, Krillin, and Yamcha all display their strength.

episodes.title: Smells Like Trouble
episodes.plot: The quarter-final matches of the World Martial Arts Tournament begin. First up is Krillin vs. Bacterian.

episodes.title: Yamcha vs. Jackie Chun
episodes.plot: The quarter-final matches of the World Martial Arts Tournament continue with Jackie Chun vs. Yamcha and Nam vs. Ranfan.

episodes.title: Monster Beast Giran
episodes.plot: After a rain delay and a bar fight involving several tournament participants, the last quarter-final match of the World Martial Arts Tournament, Goku vs. Giran, gets underway.

episodes.title: Krillin's Frantic Attack!
episodes.plot: After interviews with Goku and Krillin, the semi-final matches of the World Martial Arts Tournament get underway. First up is Krillin vs. Jackie Chun.

episodes.title: Danger from Above
episodes.plot: The semi-final matches of the World Martial Arts Tournament conclude with Goku vs. Nam.

episodes.title: The Grand Finals
episodes.plot: Goku fights Jackie Chun in the final match of the World Martial Arts Tournament.

episodes.title: Number One Under the Moon
episodes.plot: The epic fight between Goku and Jackie Chun continues.

episodes.title: The Final Blow
episodes.plot: The conclusion of the fight between Jackie Chun and Goku, who has now once again turned into a monster after looking at the full moon.
